colum_1_1.descripton: Head off for a desert tour with locals sharing stories of the UAE's past.

colum_1_2.descripton: Discover traditional Arabian art, including calligraphy, wall decor, carpets and henna.

colum_1_3.descripton: Check out Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest building, and try to fit it into a photograph.

colum_1_4.descripton: Visit Etihad Museum, which chronicles the history of the UAE since its birth in 1971.

colum_2_1.descripton: Enjoy breakfast at the Sheikh Mohammed Centre for Cultural Understanding (SMCCU), and learn about Emirati culture.

colum_2_2.descripton: Cross the Dubai Creek on an abra and talk to the merchants as the souks open up.

colum_2_3.descripton: Induge in lunch at the Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood, one of the oldest areas in Dubai.

colum_2_4.descripton: Catch the latest show at Dubai Opera, where there's everything from opera to stand-up comedy.

colum_1_1.descripton: Head to Kite Beach for a sunrise run

colum_1_2.descripton: Bite into a delicious beachside lunch

colum_1_3.descripton: Get that adrenaline rush with an afternoon of watersports

colum_1_4.descripton: Watch the sunset by the Burj Al Arab and look back at a long day on the beach.

colum_2_1.descripton: Savour a delectable breakfast and coffee before a busy day

colum_2_2.descripton: Take in the sights and sounds of Dubai from a yacht ride

colum_2_3.descripton: Dive, sail or jet-ski - take your pick from Dubai's many marine thrills

colum_2_4.descripton: Say goodbye with a sunset stroll by the sea

colum_1_1.descripton: Take off on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure with the family and explore Dubai’s desert.

colum_1_2.descripton: Experience a traditional Bedouin lunch with locals and learn about Emirati heritage.

colum_1_3.descripton: Enjoy fun desert activities for the whole family, from sandboarding to quad biking.

colum_1_4.descripton: Watch the sun set behind the dunes while you set up camp for the night.

colum_2_1.descripton: Splash about and escape the heat at one of Dubai’s best waterparks.

colum_2_2.descripton: Enjoy precious family moments while dining at one of the city’s award-winning restaurants.

colum_2_3.descripton: Stop by the Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo for memorable marine moments.

colum_2_4.descripton: Make sure to catch the dancing Dubai Fountains - a spectacular sight you won't forget.

colum_1_1.descripton: Fasten your seatbelts and burn rubber at the Dubai Autodrome, with a supercar driving experience.

colum_1_2.descripton: Enjoy a breathtaking adventure with a thrilling ride through the desert dunes.

colum_1_3.descripton: Find the perfect picnic spot while hiking and exploring Hatta’s mountains.

colum_1_4.descripton: Escape the busy city and camp out under the stars, sharing stories with friends.

colum_2_1.descripton: Enjoy some early morning surfing or paddleboarding in the waters off Kite Beach.

colum_2_2.descripton: Embark on an underwater adventure, and go diving with one of the local scuba schools.

colum_2_3.descripton: Jump out of a plane at one of the world’s best skydiving drop zones above the Palm Jumeirah.

colum_2_4.descripton: Head to one of the city’s top food trucks for a well-deserved meal at sunset.

colum_1_1.descripton: Have breakfast while taking in the panoramic view of the Creek from your private terrace.

colum_1_2.descripton: Enjoy relaxation at its finest with a signature experience at one of Dubai's best spas.

colum_1_3.descripton: Visit Etihad Museum, which chronicles the history of the UAE since its birth in 1971.

colum_1_4.descripton: Dine out at 360, and watch the sun sinking in to the waters of the Arabian Gulf.

colum_2_1.descripton: Start the day with some fresh juice at the poolside while the sun rises over the city.

colum_2_2.descripton: Shop 'til you drop and find some bargains at one of Dubai’s many malls.

colum_2_3.descripton: Enjoy a yoga session by the sea and relax while admiring the city’s skyline.

colum_2_4.descripton: Take in the Dubai Fountains, the world’s largest and most spectacular choreographed fountains, from a cafe's terrace.
